excellent torrent, watched 20 episodes or so all work great

Had a few problems with some of the episodes, nothing major.  Some of the episodes want to skip/stop playing on my Popcorn Hour A-110 and also in VLC player.  

For example, at the 9:56 sec mark in episode 80 it skips ahead in VLC player and freezes when I play it using my Popcorn Hour.  There are several episodes that do this, but it's not that big of a deal, of the 100 or so episodes I've watched it has happened maybe 6 times or so.

Forget my previous comment, I forced utorrent to do a recheck and alot of the episodes were only at 99.5% or somewhere around there. That is why I was getting problems with some at certain parts. All fixed now.
